headline: Northern Trust Asset Management Strengthens Credit Research and High Yield Investment Expertise
summary: CHICAGO, January 10, 2025--Northern Trust Asset Management (NTAM), a leading global investment management firm with $1.3 trillion in assets under management as of September 30, 2024, announced a series of appointments in the global fixed income team to further strengthen NTAM’s credit investing and fundamental research capabilities.

raw.headline: Northern Trust Asset Management Strengthens Credit Research and High Yield Investment Expertise
raw.summary: CHICAGO, January 10, 2025--Northern Trust Asset Management (NTAM), a leading global investment management firm with $1.3 trillion in assets under management as of September 30, 2024, announced a series of appointments in the global fixed income team to further strengthen NTAM’s credit investing and fundamental research capabilities.
